# QRDM: QR Data Manager

Release **{sub-ref}`release`**

QRDM provides a Python package, network API endpoints, and web interfaces for encoding
and decoding documents as a series of QR codes.

:::{image} _static/qr-sketch.png
:alt: Diagram depicting a file becoming "encoded" into a set of QR codes, then "decoded" back into the original document.
:::

## Package Documentation

:::{toctree}
:maxdepth: 2

install
frontend
backend
reference
docker
:::
